ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Camelot
ygData.msgSnippet: I played it. It s a lot like Everquest. I am really digging it so far; it s a great game! ~Amanda ... From: D M  To:
ygData.messageBody:
I played it. It's a lot like Everquest. I am really digging it so far; it's
a great game!

~Amanda
